Plugins are python modules or packages that add functionalities to the application. Plugins can enhance user interaction with views and provide new XSLT python functions.
All plugins must implement a `register` function that will be called by the application plugin manager in order to register the plugin. This register function must be accesible from the plugins root package. ``` python def register(register_xslt_function, register_qwebchannel_class, register_proteus_component): pass ```
